NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATION OADCASTERS
October 9> 1951*
Dr. Harry J* Skoraia
11* Gregory HaU
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harryi
Reference is made to your October 7th memorandum in re honorary
memberships and citations.
1* I am in favor of an honorary membership for Waller, NBC.
2. I am in favor of a citation for Siegel*
3* I am in favor of citations for Stanton and Bullitt-
provided you recognize at least one educator of the
type represented say by the personality of Arthur Adams.
Public relations-wise all commercial recognition is un¬
wise in my opinion. Possibly Siegel and McCarty are the
answers to my criticism*
1*. I am against the recognition of Storer and/or the Okla¬
homa broadcaster who gave Dunn's outfit help, UNLESS you
get several more such men and (based on advice from Steetle)
do a kind of across-the-board-recognition so that the
principle of saluting a number of commercial broadcasters
for this activity is recognized, e. g. that we don't adorn
one or two who had private reasons for their beneficence.
5. Yes for McCarty.
I suggest the headquarters re-review all of these names after votes
are in so too many citations don't cheapen the recognition.
Sincerely,
Richard B.
Director, i
